books.name:
Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart. 
― Roy T. Bennett
books.nameRO:
Adevăratele greutăți pot fi depașite. Doar cele imaginare sunt de neînvins. 
– Theodore V. Nail
books.nameFR:
Ne soyez pas poussé par les peurs dans votre esprit. Soyez dirigé par les rêves dans votre coeur.
- Roy T. Bennett
books.nameDE:
Lass dich nicht von den Ängsten in deinem Kopf herumschubsen. Lass dich von den Träumen in deinem Herzen leiten.
- Roy T. Bennett
books.nameES:
No te dejes llevar por los miedos en tu mente. Déjate llevar por los sueños en tu corazón.
- Roy T. Bennett

books.name:
A Room Without Books Is Like A Body Without A Soul. 
– Marcus Tullius Cicero
books.nameRO:
Nu te compara cu nimeni altcineva din lume. Dacă o faci, te jigneşti pe tine. 
– Bill Gates
books.nameFR:
Une pièce sans livres est comme un corps sans âme.
- Marcus Tullius Cicero
books.nameDE:
Ein Raum ohne Bücher ist wie ein Körper ohne Seele.
- Marcus Tullius Cicero
books.nameES:
Una habitación sin libros es como un cuerpo sin alma.
- Marcus Tullius Cicero

books.name:
Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out. 
– John Wooden
books.nameRO:
Dacă nu ai un plan al tău, alţii te vor include în planurile lor. 
– Anthony Robbins
books.nameFR:
Les choses fonctionnent mieux pour ceux qui font le meilleur de la façon dont les choses fonctionnent.
- John Wooden
books.nameDE:
Die Dinge funktionieren am besten für diejenigen, die das Beste daraus machen, wie die Dinge funktionieren.
- John Wooden
books.nameES:
Las cosas funcionan mejor para aquellos que hacen lo mejor de cómo funcionan las cosas.
- John Wooden

books.name:
For Every Reason It’s Not Possible, There Are Hundreds Of People Who Have Faced The Same Circumstances And Succeeded. 
– Jack Canfield
books.nameRO:
Viața este ca mersul pe bicicletă. Pentru a-ți menține echilibrul trebuie să continui să mergi inainte. 
– Albert Einstein
books.nameFR:
Pour toutes les raisons, c’est impossible, il y a des centaines de personnes qui ont fait face aux mêmes circonstances et ont réussi.
- Jack Canfield
books.nameDE:
Aus jedem Grund ist es nicht möglich, dass Hunderte von Menschen mit denselben Umständen konfrontiert wurden und Erfolg hatten.
- Jack Canfield
books.nameES:
Por todas las razones no es posible, hay cientos de personas que han enfrentado las mismas circunstancias y han tenido éxito.
- Jack Canfield

books.name:
The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new 
- Socrates
books.nameRO:
Am urât fiecare minut de antrenament, dar mi-am spus „Nu renunța. Suferă acum și trăiește-ți restul vieții ca un campion”. 
- Muhammad Ali
books.nameFR:
Le secret du changement est de concentrer toute votre énergie, non pas à combattre le vieux, mais à construire le nouveau
- Socrate
books.nameDE:
Das Geheimnis der Veränderung besteht darin, all Ihre Energie darauf zu konzentrieren, nicht gegen das Alte zu kämpfen, sondern das Neue aufzubauen
- Socrates
books.nameES:
Las elecciones más difíciles requieren las voluntades más fuertes.
- Thanos

books.name:
The Future Belongs To The Competent. Get Good, Get Better, Be The Best! 
– Success Quote By Brian Tracy
books.nameRO:
Dacă simți că nu contezi pentru că ești prea mic, încearcă să dormi în cameră cu un țânțar.
- Dalai Lama
books.nameFR:
L'avenir appartient aux compétents. Sois bon, sois meilleur, sois le meilleur!
- Citation de la réussite par Brian Tracy
books.nameDE:
Die Zukunft gehört dem Kompetenten. Werde gut, werde besser, sei der Beste!
- Erfolgszitat von Brian Tracy
books.nameES:
El futuro pertenece a la competencia. Mejora, mejora, sé el mejor!
- Cita de éxito de Brian Tracy

books.name:
Fake It Until You Make It! Act As If You Had All The Confidence You Require Until It Becomes Your Reality. 
– Brian Tracy
books.nameRO:
Oamenii spun de multe ori că nu reușesc să își păstreze nivelul de motivație. Ei bine, nici efectele dușului nu sunt eterne
- de aceea este recomandat zilnic! 
– Zig Ziglar
books.nameFR:
Fais semblant jusqu'à ce que tu y arrives! Agissez comme si vous aviez toute la confiance dont vous avez besoin jusqu'à ce que cela devienne votre réalité.
- Brian Tracy
books.nameDE:
Fake es, bis du es schaffst! Tun Sie so, als ob Sie all das Vertrauen hätten, das Sie benötigen, bis es zu Ihrer Realität wird.
- Brian Tracy
books.nameES:
Fingir hasta que lo hagas! Actúa como si tuvieras toda la confianza que necesitas hasta que se convierta en tu realidad.
- Brian Tracy

books.name:
Reading Is To The Mind, As Exercise Is To The Body. 
– Brian Tracy
books.nameRO:
Eșecul este doar oportunitatea de a o lua de la capăt, de data aceasta într-un mod mai inteligent. 
– Henry Ford
books.nameFR:
La lecture est à l'esprit, de même que l'exercice est au corps.
- Brian Tracy
books.nameDE:
Lesen ist für den Geist, wie Übung für den Körper ist.
- Brian Tracy
books.nameES:
Leer es para la mente, como el ejercicio es para el cuerpo.
- Brian Tracy

books.name:
To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage. 
– Confucius
books.nameRO:
Fă ce trebuie să faci, până poți face ceea ce vrei să faci. 
– Oprah Winfrey
books.nameFR:
Voir ce qui est juste et ne pas le faire, c'est un manque de courage.
- Confucius
books.nameDE:
Zu sehen, was richtig ist und was nicht, ist ein Mangel an Mut.
- Confucius
books.nameES:
Ver lo que es correcto y no hacerlo es una falta de coraje.
- Confucio

books.name:
The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing. 
– Walt Disney
books.nameRO:
Multe legende, mulți oameni au fost înaintea mea. Dar acum e momentul meu. 
– Usain Bolt
books.nameFR:
Pour commencer, il faut cesser de parler et commencer à faire.
- Walt Disney
books.nameDE:
Die Art und Weise, wie Sie anfangen, ist, mit dem Sprechen aufzuhören und mit dem Tun zu beginnen.
- Walt Disney
books.nameES:
La forma de comenzar es dejar de hablar y comenzar a hacer.
- Walt Disney

books.name:
The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty. 
– Winston Churchill
books.nameRO:
Fă ce trebuie să faci, până poți face ceea ce vrei să faci. 
– Oprah Winfrey

books.name:
Don’t Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today. 
– Will Rogers
books.nameRO:
Eșecul este doar oportunitatea de a o lua de la capăt, de data aceasta într-un mod mai inteligent. 
– Henry Ford

books.name:
You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don’t Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character. 
– Unknown
books.nameRO:
Multe legende, mulți oameni au fost înaintea mea. Dar acum e momentul meu. 
– Usain Bolt

books.name:
It’s Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It’s Whether You Get Up. 
– Inspirational Quote By Vince Lombardi
books.nameRO:
Oamenii spun de multe ori că nu reușesc să își păstreze nivelul de motivație. Ei bine, nici efectele dușului nu sunt eterne
- de aceea este recomandat zilnic! 
– Zig Ziglar

books.name:
If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don’t Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You. 
– Steve Jobs
books.nameRO: Dacă simți că nu contezi pentru că ești prea mic, încearcă să dormi în cameră cu un țânțar.- Dalai Lama

books.name:
People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do. 
– Rob Siltanen
books.nameRO:
Am urât fiecare minut de antrenament, dar mi-am spus „Nu renunța. Suferă acum și trăiește-ți restul vieții ca un campion”. 
- Muhammad Ali

books.name:
Failure Will Never Overtake Me If My Determination To Succeed Is Strong Enough. 
– Og Mandino
books.nameRO:
Viața este ca mersul pe bicicletă. Pentru a-ți menține echilibrul trebuie să continui să mergi inainte. 
– Albert Einstein

books.name:
Entrepreneurs Are Great At Dealing With Uncertainty And Also Very Good At Minimizing Risk. That’s The Classic Entrepreneur. 
– Mohnish Pabrai
books.nameRO:
Dacă nu ai un plan al tău, alţii te vor include în planurile lor. 
– Anthony Robbins

books.name:
Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do. 
– Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe
books.nameRO:
Nu te compara cu nimeni altcineva din lume. Dacă o faci, te jigneşti pe tine. 
– Bill Gates

books.name:
We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated. 
– Maya Angelou
books.nameRO:
Adevăratele greutăți pot fi depașite. Doar cele imaginare sunt de neînvins. 
– Theodore V. Nail

books.name:
Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like? 
– Brian Tracy
books.nameRO:
Dacă nu ai un plan al tău, alţii te vor include în planurile lor. 
– Anthony Robbins

books.name:
Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right. 
– Quote By Henry Ford

Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing. 
– Life Quote By Helen Keller

The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others. 
– Hasidic Proverb

The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today. 
– Motivational Quote By Franklin D. Roosevelt

Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun. 
– Albert Einstein

What You Lack In Talent Can Be Made Up With Desire, Hustle And Giving 110% All The Time. 
– Don Zimmer

Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are. 
– Theodore Roosevelt

Develop An ‘Attitude Of Gratitude’. Say Thank You To Everyone You Meet For Everything They Do For You.

You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream. 
– C.S. Lewis

The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
